entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Invermere
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
